idea-plugin.name: Code Style Check Tool
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin is used for code style checking. It could report code smells in your source files. If you want to add more customization please contact me, or checkout the CodeStyleChecker project on github.

Note: this plugin scans the file content based on the text, but no any AST technologies are used. If some issues were reported inaccurately, please ignore it or leave a comment. Thanks.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
24.06.2018 - Now resulting report support 2 approaches to view issues: view by author; view by issue type.

21.06.2018 - Support navigation within editor by line number.

20.06.2018 - Totally we support 54 code style check items for Java and Groovy.

05.06.2018 - Initial version for release. Please contact me if any issues.
